name: EnergeeksSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on kitchen light”
”Alexa, brighten livingroom light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
If you have any problem when you use this skill, you can contact us with email : support@energeeks.com

You can simply ask Alexa to turn on, turn off your sockets, lights, air conditioner or dim the light. 
There’s no need to go to the switch to adjust you home light - just talk to Alexa on your Amazon Echo, Echo Dot, Amazon Tap or Echo Show. 

After connecting Alexa to your Energeeks Smart products in a few simple steps:
(1) Download our "Energeeks 3.0" app in android or ios app market;
(2) Register one Energeeks account in our "Energeeks 3.0" app;
(3) You need to have some Energeeks devices in hand;
(4) Configure these devices in our "Energeeks 3.0" app and change appropriate name for your devices which will be used in "Energeeks Smart Home" skills;
(5) Download Amazon "Alexa" app from android,ios or Amazon app market;
(6) Configure Echo with "Alexa" app;
(7) Search "Energeeks Smart Home" skill from the "Alexa" app skills category;
(8) Click Enable skill of "Energeeks Smart Home", and you'll be navigated to Energeeks login page;
(9) Input your Energeeks account username and password, you'll be redirect to the success page;
(10) Now all setup is finished. 

You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these:
“Alexa, turn on kitchen light"
“Alexa, turn off kitchen light"
“Alexa, turn on the room socket"
“Alexa, turn off the room socket"
“Alexa, dim livingroom light"
“Alexa, brighten livingroom light"
“Alexa, set the livingroom light to 20 percent"
“Alexa, turn on bedroom air conditioner"
“Alexa, turn off bedroom air conditioner"

Currently this skill supports products:
Wifi smart switch
Wifi smart socket
Wifi smart bulb
Wifi Smart IR
Wifi alarm
Wifi IP camera
Wifi smart thermostat
